text:
Private candidates who wish to appear for the class 8 (ESLC) public examinations to be held in April 2016 can file their applications online through the respective nodal centres on March 11 and 12. Candidates would have to apply only online and application sent through post will be rejected. They would have to pay the fee of Rs.625 besides the application registration fee of Rs.50 in cash at the nodal centres, according to a press release from V. Murugan, Regional Deputy Director of Government Examinations, Tiruchi.

‘PF Near You’

The Employees Provident Fund Organisation would organise the monthly “PF Near You”, programme at its sub-regional office in the city on Thursday. The programme is not only meant to redress grievances of subscribers and employers but also to invite their suggestions and sensitise stakeholders of the new initiatives taken by the EPFO. The meet would be open for subscribers from 10.30 a.m. to 1 p.m.; for employers from 3 p.m. to 4 p.m. and for exempted establishments from 4 p.m. to 5 p.m., G. Sivakumar, Regional Provident Fund Commissioner, Tiruchi, said in a press release.
title: TAMIL NADU
